result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bobby Ray Giles Jr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Bobby Ray Giles Jr appeared by video.  Attorney Nicholas John Conrardy in court for Bobby Ray Giles Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Jacob A. Maule in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant has a new case pending.  Defense is requesting an adjournment for a possible global resolution.  Case is adjourned to 11-9-22 at 1:30 pm for a status conference by zoom.
This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616
Status conference scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Bobby Ray Giles Jr appeared by video.  Attorney Nicholas John Conrardy appeared by video for Bobby Ray Giles Jr.  Jessica Birmingham appeared under the Student Practice Rule under the supervision of Attorney Michelle Grasso for the State of Wisconsin. 
Defendant is requesting Attorney Conrardy withdraw from the case. Arguments heard.  Court denied defendant's request for Attorney Conrardy to withdraw. 
Attorney Conrardy needs more time to talk to his client and is requesting a status conference.  Case is adjourned to 10-10-22 at 8:30 am for status conference.
Status conference scheduled for October 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.

CASE RECALLED IN THE AFTERNOON:  
Defendant Bobby Ray Giles in court with attorney Nicholas John Conrardy.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court canceled bench warrant and reinstated $750.00 PR bond. 
Case is adjourned to 9-7-22 at 8:30 am for status conference.
  This hearing may be streamed live on DAcast at the discretion of the Court:
https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/d84cd54a-763c-3a58-15a9-b84acf306616  Status conference scheduled for September 7, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Nicholas John Conrardy in court.  Claire E Zyber appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   All parties appeared by video conference.
Case in court for a status confernce.  Defendant does not appear.  Bench warrant was previously issued on 7-11-22.  Court ordered $750.00 PR bond forfeited.

All previously ordered conditions of bail remain.
NO CONTACT ORDER ORALLY AMENDED. DEFENDANT MAY CONTACT BMI FOR THE PURPOSES OF CHILD EXCHANGE ONLY.
Court ordered bench warrant WITHDRAWN.  Recall issued.

Defendant Bobby Ray Giles-Goodman in court.  Navjot Singh Hira appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 10.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 22, 2022 at 08:30 am.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT REMANDED TO THE COMMISSIONER ON RETURN OF THE BENCH WARRANT.

Attorney Nicholas John Conrardy in court.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defendant does not appear. Court issued a bench warrant. Court forfeited $750.00 PR bond.

Court emailed attorney Conrardy regarding appointment of counsel on this case, who then accepts.  Court appoints Attorney Nicholas Conrardy who shall be paid at the rate of $100.00 per hour. Court orders defendant to repay the County at a rate of $75.00/month beginning upon completion of the case and every month thereafter until paid in full.  Case remains scheduled for Status Conference on 6/21/2022 at 1:30 pm.  However, attorney Conrardy is unable to appear at that time.  Court will additionally schedule this case for Status Conference on 7/7/2022 at 1:30 pm.

Defendant Bobby Ray Giles-Goodman in court.  Jacob A. Maule appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Bobby Ray Giles-Goodman appeared by video means.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.
Pretrial Conference held.  Court will allow defendant additional time to obtain private counsel or will appoint counsel at next court date.  Case adjourned, Br. 10.  Status conference scheduled for June 21, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with BMI.
No Weapons Order, signed and filed.

ADDRESS INFO for Bobby Ray Giles-Goodman Jr
Current: 1653 College Avenue, South Milwaukee, WI 53172   (Effective: 04-25-2022)
Prior: 1118 South 36th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53215

Cash bail previously posted to be returned to the remitter.
No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Bobby Ray Giles-Goodman in court.  Karen Lynch Vespalec appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised that this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10. Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause. Defendant received a copy of the complaint and was advised of right to counsel. Defendant does not qualify for Public Defender representation. Court entered a plea of not guilty on behalf of the Defendant. Court reserves Defendant's right to file a substitution of judge pursuant to Sec. 971.20 right to challenge probable cause and to have complaint read until Defendant's next scheduled court appearance. Case is adjourned for a Pretrial Conference in Branch 10.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 04/25/2022 @01:30PM
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
